Welcome to the Gao Lab

We are a dynamic astroparticle physics research group at the Tsinghua University. Our goal is to explore the mistery of the Universe with particle physics approaches.

Previous Next

Currently our team members are working on detector R&D and science data analysis. We want to be able to build the perfect instruments and novel analysis techniques to answer the scientific questions we deem most important (see Research).

We are located at Tsinghua University, Department of Physics. We actively exchange ideas and closely work with our collaborators from the XENON Collboration, RELICS Collboration and the CDEX Collboration.

We are looking for passionate new PhD students, Postdocs, and Undergraduate students to join the team (more info) !
